beer.beer_description:
A refreshingly balanced Australian Ale that binds subtle malt characters with a fruity hop aroma and gentle bitterness for a clean, crisp taste. 

Style: Australian Ale 

Malt:
Pale Malt backbone, fleshed out with Munich, Caramalt and Wheat Malt. 

Hops:
Liberty (US) for kettle bittering, Crystal (US) for aroma in the whirlpool, Summer (Aus) & Pacifica (NZ) flowers for aroma in the hopback.

Pairing: 
This beer can handle some spice, perfect for asian inspired dishes.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 75 distinct venues!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 45 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 345 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 70!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 145 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 160 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 33!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 245 check-ins with a photo.
